headline: Why Interpublic Group (IPG) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of global advertising conglomerate Interpublic Group (NYSE:IPG) jumped 4.2% in the afternoon session after the Consumer Health division of Bayer selected the company as its global agency partner for all creative, media, and production.
